title: God Bless Football: Tua's Injury and Max Homa
description:
Stugotz and Billy react to Tua's injury on Thursday Night Football. Former high-school football great and President's Cup Champion, Max Homa, joins the show to make some NFL picks. Chris Simms reveals he's a germaphobe and used to smell his hand. Mike Golic discusses players fighting with coaches and Mojo, Chris, Joba and K-Funk pick some games. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
